AzureBlade: They are not really psychic powers, but it does not 
matter. I could find it out, but I need him to be calm before I can do 
anything.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nightstrike/Alphah:
> 
> "TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF ME, SCUMB!!!!" shouted Nightstrike while  he 
> tried to free himself. The decepticon resisted to walk.
> 
> *****
> 
> "Azure... do you... er have pyscis' powers "asked Alpah "If you 
could 
> do it, you can use them to find out what happened with Condor and 
how 
> he became Nightstrike and... perhaps how we can help him..."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::Prowl/Epyon/Hot Rod/Skyburst::
> > 
> > Skyburst quickly grabbed Nightstrike, placing energy cuffs on him. 
> Hot
> > Rod transformed to bot mode, and also took hold of the Decepticon. 
> > 
> > "That may be what happans in your kind, but not here. You will not 
> be
> > killed unless you fight, and we dont torture our prisoners. Take 
> him to
> > a cell," ordered Prowl.
> > 
> > Hot Rod and Skyburst walked off, taking Nightstrike to a cell.
> > 
> > Prowl turned back to the others, as does Epyon.
> > "Well, we got Condor back," says Epyon.
> > "Now how do we help him?" Askes Prowl.
